r.s: Object-oriented PHP HTTP Client for PHP 5.3+
r.d: Guzzle is a PHP HTTP client library and framework for building RESTful web service clients
r.n: * Fixing phar detection when forcing a cacert to system if null or true * Allowing filename to be passed to `Guzzle\Http\Message\Request::setResponseBody()` * Cleaning up `Guzzle\Common\Collection::inject` method * Adding a response_body location to service descriptions
